title: Asian Stock Rally Eases as Japan Slips, Oil Falls: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks, off to their best-ever start to a year, took a breather Wednesday with Japanese equities slipping amid rising tensions with China.
content: Asian stocks, off to their best-ever start to a year, took a breather Wednesday with Japanese equities slipping amid rising tensions with China.
